about_the_game:
Run, glide, and grapple across an open world filled with floating islands. Armed with an Eye that gives you the power to rewind and accelerate time, use it to solve puzzles, fight enemies, and rescue your dragon friends.

Bob was peacefully living with his dragon friends when one day he was attacked by an army of flying eyeballs with time-manipulation abilities. They kidnapped his dragons, turned them back into eggs by de-aging them, then hid the eggs in time rifts scattered across hundreds of floating islands. Luckily one Eye was sympathetic to his cause and offered to help. But at what cost?

EXPLORE FLOATING ISLANDS

Run, glide, and grapple across an open world filled with floating islands.

REWIND TIME

Rewind time to change the outcome of combat, fix a mistimed jump, or solve puzzles.

SOLVE TIME INVERSION PUZZLES

Use inverter monoliths to invert your timeflow, causing all other objects in forward time to rewind relative to you. This includes a timeclone of your past self that will replay your previous actions in reverse order.

HATCH DRAGONS

After solving a time rift puzzle you will be rewarded with a dragon egg. Hatch dragons to increase your health and stamina, as well as to unlock unique powers associated with each dragon. Feed your dragons to grow them and increase the potency of their powers.

name: Eyewinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows8 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Run, glide, and grapple across an open world filled with floating islands. Armed with an Eye that gives you the power to rewind and accelerate time, use it to solve puzzles, fight enemies, and rescue your dragon friends.
